parse.title: Zombies (Slayer assignment)
parse.text:
Zombies are a type of Slayer assignment.

Contents

  • 1 Slayer Masters
  • 2 Eligible monsters
    • 2.1 Surface
    • 2.2 Dungeoneering
    • 2.3 Minigames
    • 2.4 Quest
    • 2.5 Removed
  • 3 Update history

Slayer Masters[edit | edit source]

The following Slayer Masters assign zombies:

MasterTask amountsUnlock requirements
Jacquelyn15-30 9, The Blood Pact
The Raptor100-140None
Vannaka40-60 10

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included – see here for how to help out!
  • patch 24 April 2023 (Update):
    • The Edimmu room is now accessible with suitable Slayer Tasks such as ghost, zombie, undead, Creatures of Daemonheim, and Edimmu selected.
